mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment
SELECT id, member_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date FROM payment WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (id, member_id, amount, payment_method, pg_company, status, transaction_id, payment_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{memberId}, #{amount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{pgCompany}, #{status}, #{transactionId}, #{paymentDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET member_id = #{memberId}, amount = #{amount}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, pg_company = #{pgCompany}, status = #{status}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, payment_date = #{paymentDate} WHERE id = #{id}
